channel.title: Pipol can just bcome mods on mine help i wnana remove it
channel.description:
i was running my "pimp" based source pkin server then a guy called pimp logged in and he banned my user i asked him how he said he only typed ::mod3 how do i disable this code plz help me thanx ~sid
[quote] OwNeR Of -: IP-219.88.216.237 port - 43594 name - pkerscape[br][size=1]Posted at: December 22, 2006, 02:23:13 AM[/size][hr][glow=red,2,300]rep++ if u can help me solve it [/glow]

item.title: Pipol can just bcome mods on mine help i wnana remove it
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Ban the Names:

Baller
Pimp
And some Others

Go into ur Source
Go to the Map Called “Data” go to Administrators.txt and admins.txt (If you got it)
Delete all the Names

Read full topic
